brief.content-text:
The diagram depicts how IP packets can travel over different media. Two PC's are connected to a group of routers in a network cloud. IP packets are not concerned with the type of media on which they are traveling. Various types of links are shown:
- Link from PC1 to Router1 - Media is copper Ethernet.
- Link from Router1 to Router2 - Media is copper serial.
- Link from Router2 to Router3 - Media is optical fiber.
- Link from Router3 to Router4 - Media is copper Ethernet.
- Link from Router4 to PC2 - Media is wireless.
